emailtemplate.title: Complaint Received
emailtemplate.enhancededitorhtml:
GOV.UK

Complaint received

We have received your complaint about {!Case:Complaint About;}.

Reference number

​​​​​​​​​​​​​​{!Case:Case Number;}

Summary of what you told us

{!Case:Complaint;}

Your supporting information

{!Case:Your Supporting Information;}

What happens next

Your complaint will be reviewed by BSR. Once we have reviewed it, we will contact you to tell you what we will do next. This may take up to 21 working days. 


If you don't hear from us after 21 working days, contact BSR, quoting your reference number. 


Email bsr@bsr.co.uk or phone BSR on 0300 790 6787


BSR is open Monday to Friday from 8.30am to 5pm, except Wednesdays when we are open from 10am to 5pm.


Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. 


BSR Customer Service Team

emailtemplate.title: Contact the Building Safety Regulator
emailtemplate.enhancededitorhtml:
GOV.UK

Contact the Building Safety Regulator

Introduction paragraph.

Reference number

{!Case:Case Number;}​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

What you need to do

Insert paragraph if the recipient needs to take action.

What happens next

Insert paragraph on what the recipient should expect.

Email bsr@bsr.co.uk or phone BSR on 0300 790 6787


BSR is open Monday to Friday from 8.30am to 5pm, except Wednesdays when we are open from 10am to 5pm.


BSR Customer Service Team

emailtemplate.title: GOV.UK Template
emailtemplate.description: Generic GOV.UK email template to create consistent emails across BSR. To create a template for a different table (e.g. Accounts), first create the email template record, then copy and paste all HTML from this template.
emailtemplate.enhancededitorhtml:
GOV.UK

Contact the Building Safety Regulator

Dear A Name,

This is the first paragraph.

This is the second paragraph. It is longer than the first and wraps on to two lines.

This paragraph includes a line-break:
This is the line after the line-break.

This is an inset paragraph used for data or callouts
Application reference: 123456789
Date received: 15 March 2015

Second level heading 24px

Third level heading 19px

Intro before a url: https://www.gov.uk/service-start-page

Intro before a phone number: 0800 123 456

This is for terms and conditions and other rubric that is needed.
This is the line after the line-break.

emailtemplate.title: Question to BSR received
emailtemplate.enhancededitorhtml:
GOV.UK

Question to BSR received

We have received your question to BSR

Reference number

​​​​​​​​​​​​​​{!Case:Case Number;}​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

What you told us

{!Case:Question;}​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

What happens next

Your question will be reviewed by BSR. Once we have reviewed it, we will contact you to tell you what we will do next. This may take up to 21 working days. 


If you don't hear from us after 21 working days, contact BSR, quoting your reference number. 


Email bsr@bsr.co.uk or phone BSR on 0300 790 6787


BSR is open Monday to Friday from 8.30am to 5pm, except Wednesdays when we are open from 10am to 5pm.


Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. 


BSR Customer Service Team
